welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Aranjuez! This charming city is famous for its stunning Royal Palace and beautiful gardens. We invite you to explore and enjoy all the beauty and history that Aranjuez has to offer."

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for regional and low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The newest and largest terminal at Barajas Airport, serving mainly international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The oldest terminal at Barajas Airport, currently undergoing renovations.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: A small terminal used mainly for domestic flights and low-cost carriers.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: The main terminal at Barajas Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 4S
terminals.description: Also known as Terminal 4 Satellite, this terminal is connected to Terminal 4 and mainly serves long-haul international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but a premium option with faster speeds is also available for purchase.
